page.title: 09 A DAY IN AN ADULTS LIFE
page.content: We interviewed Mrs.Collins who lives in Downham Road. She told us about a normal day in her life. She gets up about 7.00 and lets her two dogs out.After that she wakes her daughter up and makes their breakfast. They usually have porridge. Then she makes the beds and after that she washes and dresses. She takes her daughter to school at 8.45 and then she does the house work.If it's warm she takes the dogs for a walk. She has lunch about 12.00 and then she does some ironing. If it's nice and warm she sits in the garden, or sometimes she cleans the windows.After that she prepares the dinner then goes to pick her daughter up.Then she gets her dinner. Finally she gets her son's dinner. Afterwards they all watch T.V. before going to bed at 10.00.
